title: Lawful basis for processing
description: Project documents a lawful basis for personal data processing.
remediation: Add documentation describing the lawful basis for processing personal data and where consent is stored.

title: Data minimization
description: Only necessary personal data is collected and stored.
remediation: Review data flows; remove unnecessary personal data collection and shorten retention periods.

title: Right to access / portability
description: Mechanisms exist for users to access and export their personal data.
remediation: Implement API or UI endpoints allowing users to export or retrieve their personal data.

title: Security of processing
description: Appropriate technical measures (encryption, access control) are in place.
remediation: Enable encryption in transit and at rest; enforce least privilege for access.
